description: Base item type for dashboard and report components. Items are reusable building blocks that can be placed in layouts. They have size, position, and type-specific settings. Items can be widgets (data visualizations) or groups (containers for other items).

name.description: Display name of the item. Shown in item selector and as widget title.

description.description: Detailed description of what this item displays or does. Used in tooltips and documentation.

icon.description: Icon identifier for visual representation in UI (e.g., Lucide icon name).

category_id.description: GTS identifier of the category this item belongs to. Used to organize items in the item library and help users find relevant widgets and groups for their layouts.

size.description: Size of the item in the layout grid. Width is percentage-based (flexible), height is fixed in predefined sizes.

width.description: Width as percentage of layout width (15-100%, step 5%). Determines horizontal space occupied by the item. Flexible - adapts to layout container size.

height.description: Fixed vertical size preset. Values: 'micro' (~100px), 'small' (~200px), 'medium' (~400px), 'high' (~600px), 'unlimited' (grows with content, for tables with pagination).

settings.description: Type-specific configuration object. For widgets, contains template and datasource configurations. For groups, contains collapsible behavior and nested items. Structure is defined by derived item types (widget, group).
